  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>
            <entry>oai:oai.cnice.mec.es:clao_es_20070119_2_0020210</entry>
          </identifier>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>ISFRRP-MEPSYD</catalog>
            <entry>clao_es_20070119_2_0020210</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="es">Sustituye la expresión por un latinismo</string>
            <string language="en">Substituting a Latinism for an expression</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Ersetzen von von einem Latinism für einen 
Ausdruck</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Substitution d'un Latinism à une expression</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Substituindo um Latinism para uma expressão</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Sostituendo un Latinism per un'espressione</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αντικατάσταση ενός Latinism για μια έκφραση</string>
          </title>
          <language>es</language>
          <description>
            <string language="es">Se trata de un ejercicio en el que se elige un elemento de una lista desplegable, hasta completar 8.</string>
            <string language="en">This exercise allows the students to select an item in a drop down list until they have completed eight expressions.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">expresiones</string>
            <string language="en">expressions</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">latín</string>
            <string language="en">Latin</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <value>collection</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Übung erlaubt den Kursteilnehmern, ein 
Einzelteil in einem Tropfen auszuwählen ausdrucken unten, bis sie 
acht Ausdrücke durchgeführt haben.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Cet exercice permet aux étudiants de choisir un 
élément dans une baisse énumèrent vers le bas jusqu'à ce qu'ils 
aient terminé huit expressions.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Este exercício permite que os estudantes 
selecionem um artigo em uma gota alista para baixo até que terminem 
oito expressões.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questa esercitazione permette che gli allievi 
selezionino un articolo in una goccia giù elenca fino a che non 
abbiano completato otto espressioni.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτή η άσκηση επιτρέπει στους σπουδαστές για να 
επιλέξει ένα αντικείμενο σε μια απελευθέρωση κάτω από τον 
κατάλογο έως ότου έχουν ολοκληρώσει οκτώ εκφράσεις.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Ausdrücke</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Lateinisch</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">expressions</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Latin</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">expressões</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Latin</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">espressioni</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Latino</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">εκφράσεις</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Λατινικά</string>
          </keyword>
